      • expandHost

        public static Set<String> expandHost(String addr)
                              throws IgniteCheckedException
        Parses and expands range of IPs, if needed. Host names without the range returned as is.
        Parameters:
        addr - Host with or without `~` range.
        Returns:
        Set of individual host names (IPs).
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - In case of error.
